website_summaries.verdict: A cute novelty in the Furby world that celebrates Star Wars culture.
pros: Makes cool Wookie sounds and hums songs from the movies
cons: Some owners say it's not quite as interactive as a traditional Furby (though it's still a lot of fun)

customer_reviews.title: Gum stuck to the bottom!
customer_reviews.text: That one star is not fair to the Furbacca itself, but I can't rate this purchase any higher than a one because the box arrived already open, no cardboard packaging, the pamphlet that came with it was crumbled and had tape on it and to top it off, the worst thing of all is that there was chewed up gum stuck to the bottom of it! This was obviously a used or returned item that I was expecting to be brand new and without GUM FROM SOME STRANGERS MOUTH! This is the most ridiculous thing I have seen from an order so far.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Amazing item.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually buy items like this except for my children. I am not a collector. However this is so cute and just makes me smile. The Furbacca is really better or at least as awesome as in the advertising. I would highly recommend this for kids and or big kids. And the shipping speed through Amazon is very fast. My only gripe would be the amazon shipping label on the outside of the product box. It was not sent in a shipping box. I am not sure why this was done, This definitely took away from the manufacturers packaging
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Best Furby ever made!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves Furbys. We have purchased a few not so great ones in the past, I.e. latest model. We call them “glitches”. They are not worth the $ IMO. After reading reviews and researching I chose this guy. Say hello to Furbacca! A Wookie and a Furby that sings, dances, speaks, coos and hums the theme songs! He’s cute, funny and quite odd. His eyes have LCD screens built in and display images too. We are all extremely happy with the brand new “2015” Furbacca-Furby .He’s cute, fluffy, smart and is not overly annoying nor glitchy. If you love Star Wars or Chewbacca this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Carpe-diem

customer_reviews.title: Yawnbaca
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had so much fun with her Furby our son wanted Furbaca. Furbaca does much less than a normal furby. He appears to have a single personality unlike normal Furby. The app lets you feed and shower him for interactions. Nothing else. He started off cute and fun. After about an hour my son said it was boring and annoying. He began throwing it, pulling it's tail, anything to make it angry and do something else. It did not. Now it sleeps.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Stiltz

customer_reviews.title: A big hit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Furbaca for my five year old son for Christmas. He is so cool! He was a big hit with the whole family and my girls have asked for their own. I found myself playing with him before wrapping him for Christmas. My son carries him everywhere. The only complaint I have is that his batteries ran down in less than a month. Hopefully they were just bad batteries.
customer_reviews.author: AHeartsSong

customer_reviews.title: Soo funny and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my daughter and son in law as kind of a gag gift for Christmas. This thing made us all crack up. It really is a quality product and they put alot of thought into how he sounds and the way he hums the star wars theme will crack you up. Don't hesitate!
customer_reviews.author: mcloutier55

customer_reviews.title: Totally a must for all Star Wars Fans...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 46th Birthday and absolutely love him; the app leaves much to be desired but that's moot compared to just playing with Furbacca; have another older Furby and they love talking to eachother... A+
customer_reviews.author: kyleskrazy

customer_reviews.title: adorable
customer_reviews.text: My son and I watched what could be done with furbacca on youtube. we were really surprised and glad we ordered it as a Christmas gift for my two year old granddaughter but decided to give it to my older son instead. We know he will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Koch

customer_reviews.title: Different than expected But ok
customer_reviews.text: It reacted differently than expected but my grandson enjoys it but says it chats a lot! The eyes I didn’t care for as I purchased an still have one of the original Furby’s when they first came out for my oldest son , My grandsons Dad!
customer_reviews.author: NanNa

customer_reviews.title: Chewie is mute.
customer_reviews.text: We were super excited to receive this product, unfourtamtly when we got the item the sound did not work. We returned it. Other then that it's super cute. But decided not to re-purchase it. Fast refund thank you.
customer_reviews.author: casey j riemer

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after very little usage, tried multiple resets and other fixes i could find to no avail. Hasbro doesn't make them anymore and can't offer a replacement for the same product or repair this one. They DID offer to replace it with another Furby but my son wasn't interested in a non-star wars Furby. Hasbro's service was amazing while figuring out what we could do for the situation which is why it still gets 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Rice

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: This toy worked great for about three months then it started looping the sleeping pattern over again. New batteries and a reset did nothing to help. I tried to contact the manufacturer, but no answer. I am disappointed with Hasbro and I am not planning on buying anything from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie S. Seamons

customer_reviews.title: The Force is with this Furby!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son has a love hate relationship with this thing, he thinks it's cool and fun and interesting. He loves the associated tablet app, but also he gets a little annoyed when it won't shut up (As do I). But I do love that it is Star Wars theme, and when it sings the Star Wars music that makes the purchase worth the price. May the Force be with You!
customer_reviews.author: David Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have For a Star Wars Fan!
customer_reviews.text: I have two regular Furby Booms, but when I saw this one, I HAD to have it. I love the Chewbacca/Furblish sounds that this Furby makes. While he's different from the regular Booms, he still interacts with them some. The optional app for this Furby is pretty cool too. It's similar to the one for the regular Furby, but is "Star Wars" themed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wright

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: We love love love furbacca! My kids play with him 3-4 times a week! He wasn’t a gift that they played with 1/2 times then forgot about. Kids ages: 10-19. Hit with all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Hasbro has gone down hill, puts out junk that shorts out or gears wear out.
customer_reviews.text: Furby promptly stopped working in 2017. Tried reset procedures and brand new fresh batteries. The thing is in pristine shape, Daughter gently plays with it when its not on her shelf for expensive dolls. Not dropped, nothing visually indicating issues. I was told that Hasbro was putting out junk and this confirms it. 85 dollar piece of junk. Don't buy. Avoid Hasbro products.
customer_reviews.author: Fluffle Wuppy

customer_reviews.title: Great lil toy
customer_reviews.text: Great new furby. This one has a deep sleep mode. So it will only wake up when picked up. Very nice compared to the other older models. It’s a great little toy for kids and adults !
customer_reviews.author: joanjettfan

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it and says it works exactly as it's supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter loves it - she's a Furby and Star Wars fan. I will say it is cute and not as loud as her other Furby, so that is a plus. The app you can download to work with it, works well and adds some extra fun to this item. I would definitely recommend it, but I got it on sale at about 45% off the normal price, and personally, I wouldn't pay more than $45 for it!
customer_reviews.author: Jo H.

customer_reviews.title: Childhood Dream
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how to talk to it or train it. Which is annoying but I got it because it reminded me of my childhood. Star Wars and the Furbys all in one. My support dog Newcastle however wines and thinks it’s a new friend because Chewbacca talks to him(not me yet!
customer_reviews.author: Troy Inskeep

customer_reviews.title: Good with or without app
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The app worked great on Ipad, but did not function on my android tablet. May be because I had bluetooth off on tablet, but it does not say in the instructions that it should be on. We did have bluetooth running on the ipad. App is large, but even without the tablet this is still a cool toy and my little girl loved it as soon as she saw it.
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Star Wars fans will love it
customer_reviews.text: My son says it’s great due to being a Star Wars fan but lacks functionality of a standard furby.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a Furby and/or Star Wars fan of any age this is a must have item. This is definitely the cutest and most pleasing colored of the Furby Booms. The app is similar to the normal Furby boom app except it is Star Wars themed. Now if Hasbro will only make a yoda Furby I think explode like the death star from cuteness overload and nostalgia.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy!
customer_reviews.text: Product came right on time and it was exactly as described on the website's description, my son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: If you like Star Wars, you NEED this!!!
customer_reviews.text: After picking up her first Furby a few days prior, my six year old daughter who is a big Star Wars fan, couldn't wait to get her hands on this one! We live in Scotland but were in Orlando for vacation at the time, so we ordered it online having failed to pick it up locally and it arrived the following day. She was over the moon with it and even took it along to Hollywood Studios to show Chewie, who gave it his own roar of approval!!! A must for any Furby owner who loves Star Wars!
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Like it yes says chewy!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you You’re great! The item I purchased was exactly as stated and I am very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again lol
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely satisfied with the purchase. Bought it’s a gift and the person loved it
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Brian Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Love love love furbacca.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love love love my furbacca. I had the first generation furbies. Wasn't overly impressed with my first experince. This generation Furby is sooooo well worth adventuring with. Alittle slow in delivery, but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Pattylee

customer_reviews.title: New furby fan
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, as shown, daughter loves him,2nd once for her, great present,.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Cartagena

customer_reviews.title: Super fun.
customer_reviews.text: Super fun. Talks well with my older Furby. granddaughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Cindie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my 11 yr old grandson who is crazy about Star Wars. This is the response I received, "BEST GIFT EVER!"
customer_reviews.author: TWest

customer_reviews.title: Chewbacca Furby
customer_reviews.text: My son loved getting this curvy for his birthday! He didn’t want a Furby connect and this was a perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product marred by shipping choices.
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is great at a great price. The shipping label was slapped on the main panel of the box, not great for presentaion as it was a gift, also if it had arrived this way at home the surprise would have been spoiled. I'm all for saving shipping costs but this expirience could have been better if boxed and shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Flexo

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: I received this in its own packaging which was a miss from Amazon... The toy is amazing I bought it to gift it...
customer_reviews.author: Cottoncandy

customer_reviews.title: Only for fans of "Star Wars"
customer_reviews.text: This is not Furby in its nature. If you think you'll get a cool looking Furby - please don't be disappointed. It's just a collectible toy for fans of Star Wars. It's a really well made toy. *HE* is howling, singing some Star Wars theme melodies. *HE* also reacts to: belly tickling, stroking, shaking, tail pulling and moving him upside-down. But don't try to teach him something - it's useless :) Yes, *HE* is able to listen to a music and dance, of course :)
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: It's adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband, who is obsessed with Star Wars. It is absolutely adorable and our kids can't play with it enough! It comes with an app, but not much to do on it...that's really the only thing disappointing with the toy. Would reccomend as a gift for anyone who loves Star Wars.
customer_reviews.author: Elara

customer_reviews.title: Beware no OFF SWITCH
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves this toy. He takes it with him to school and everywhere else he go to. The bad thing about it there is no off switch.
customer_reviews.author: brad collett

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is adorable. His eyes kinda freak me out because they are digital, not like the old school furries, but all in all, the Furbacca is very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Evelroze

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Star Wars kid!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! My grandson and his friends get such a kick out of this!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M Niles

customer_reviews.title: Sad we wasted the money
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a week. He just skips and wont even turn on anymore. Sad we wasted the money. I dont suggest buying this if you have toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Nightzhade

customer_reviews.title: I'm not really a furby fan but I do love my wookie so this was a must and I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute. I'm not really a furby fan but I do love my wookie so this was a must and I'm totally loving it. It does everything as advertised and looks as you would expect. A little pricey but of course it would be......it IS Star Wars. Totally worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Meghann

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the app is no longer available but he is very cute and cheeky
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: grandson loved it
customer_reviews.text: what more can i say? works as described and it is the grandsons favorite.
customer_reviews.author: mark justus

customer_reviews.title: Perpetually Sleeps.
customer_reviews.text: We had about 4 hours of typical furby interaction, then it started repeatedly falling asleep. We replaced the batteries, rebooted it, and all it does is wake up and fall back asleep. So infuriating! I wish we had never wasted our money.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Cute, creepy, glad I got it.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. I almost wish I had ordered two. I wasn't sure my 18 yr old Star Wars fan would want it, but she loves it. I am thinking of buying another to put away as a collector item in the hope it gains in value someday.
customer_reviews.author: TDK

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with it. It look like the picture and my son was so happy with it .The battery die fast so
customer_reviews.author: Yari

customer_reviews.title: Not cool!
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked the item in a box/packaging as to not damage the box. Interested of the product taped up and labe attach to the box. Not happy with your packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Melgoza

customer_reviews.title: ... I was able to find on Amazon for a great price and even better shipping
customer_reviews.text: Thankful that I was able to find on Amazon for a great price and even better shipping. Arrived in perfect condition and did exactly what I needed it to. Great purchase and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: If you like Firebird, you’ll love this guy! Arrived in good condition and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L Cook

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun and Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: I got this product as a birthday gift for my younger brother and he absolutely loves it! Its very fun and entertaining. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Viviann Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat
customer_reviews.text: Overall really fun! I ordered one and it didn't work but sent it back for a refund and got a second one that worked perfectly. The app is fun but I don't use it a ton, my favorite part is the food in the app as Furby reacts differently to different foods vs feeding by hand with the same reaction each time. I wish this model's language adapted more like how I remember old Furbys but the Star Wars songs and wookie noises are fun.
customer_reviews.author: barbie

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My son spent his own money on this, and has loved it.
customer_reviews.author: LaCresha Clough

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Chewbacca and Furby lover!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this guy and he is a nice twist on the Furbies they already have :) He definitely makes Chewbacca type sounds which makes kiddos happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cellens

customer_reviews.title: Big hit
customer_reviews.text: Since it was a Christmas present, it would have been nice of the shipping label had not just been slapped on the original box. Other than that, it works wonderful and was a big hit!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly mikels

customer_reviews.title: like I have to go to a quiet room and ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this. I think I got a defective Furbaca. I can barely hear any of the noises..like I have to go to a quiet room and put my ear up to it just to hear the sounds. So I'm pretty disappointed and so are my kids. It is really really cute though so that's the only reason I'm giving it 3 stars. I think I will return and hopefully get another one that works properly.
customer_reviews.author: Byoshihashi

customer_reviews.title: Yes it's annoying, but that's a Furby
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this! Yes it's annoying, but that's a Furby.. The quality is spot on and it's the perfect blend of Star Wars and Furby with the sounds and 'songs'.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Star Wars fans will love it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this, he wanted a Furby and he is a Star Wars fan.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Most annoying toy ever
customer_reviews.text: Most annoying toy ever. Not because its a furby but its a pain in the butt to turn off and wakes us up at night
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Loud, adorable, and irritating. Perfect for kids wanting a pet.
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with this thing. It does everything it is supposed to. Which means it never shuts up. Creepy, adorable, and irritating. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne  mussen

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for a 6 year old boy!
customer_reviews.text: Furbacca was a hit. He works as described although his speech is a little garbled. My son enjoys him. Great alternative to the over hyped hatchimals. Solid purchase for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately they don't bite or chew on
customer_reviews.text: The Dogs really get a kick out of it, I purchased it only as a novelty but they really are interested with the movements and sounds. Fortunately they don't bite or chew on it
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Super fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughters both really love this Furby. The star wars sounds are pretty cool and my five year old walks around make Furbacca noises. They love it when he talks to their other Furbies
customer_reviews.author: Todd Duvall

customer_reviews.title: For the Chewbaca fan
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I'm never taking this out of the box. I bought it to add to my Chewbaca collection. But it came in excellent condition and that's what mattered most to me
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our child's 10th birthday. Big Star Wars fans and this Furbacca is so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Kh13510

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if there were better instructions with him like the ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though the instructions say that he can communicate with other Furbies we have yet to make it happen. Would be nice if there were better instructions with him like the other Furbies have
customer_reviews.author: CT Sealey

customer_reviews.title: I sure love this little guy
customer_reviews.text: I sure love this little guy! It was a gift for my 8 y/o boy, who loved it very much...for 2 days. He has not touched it since. I think I may adopt him.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: It looks pretty cool, sounds nice and chewwy
customer_reviews.text: It looks pretty cool, sounds nice and chewwy, although it is a little hard to tell what is a happy sound and what is a sad sound. I love how he sings the empirical march.
customer_reviews.author: SpecialK

customer_reviews.title: The best boy
customer_reviews.text: The cutest boy you will ever see. He sings and dances and is adorable. Get him for your kids, friends, and strangers he is adorable I love him he’s a baby
customer_reviews.author: ronibox

customer_reviews.title: fun furby for a star wars fan
customer_reviews.text: Super fun furby, if you are a star wars fan. The star wars features are great. It not as interactive as other furby like crystal or boom
customer_reviews.author: Michael Y.

customer_reviews.title: Fake furby
customer_reviews.text: I'm thinking it's a fake Furby it will not connect to the app
customer_reviews.author: dan shamblin

customer_reviews.title: The furbacca is adorable and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Came the day I was expecting it. The package came in brand new and undamaged (as expected). The furbacca is adorable and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Taliah Greeley

customer_reviews.title: Great Version of Furby: but App still won't connect
customer_reviews.text: It's an Alright version of Furby, it's just the app is really broken, it has a very hard time connecting half the time, so I can't really give it a full review, I am reviewing it based on base functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Force is with Furbaca !!!
customer_reviews.text: So funny, it shoots lazer sounds at you, sings the star wars themes. I gave it to my wife. She has so much fun with it. And my grand daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: O. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: a lot of fun, best part is that he hums star wars ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my niece and was the hero of Christmas! a lot of fun, best part is that he hums star wars music!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Chewie Approved
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my nephew as a Christmas present and he loves it! Best part is when it starts dancing to one of the Star Wars songs.
customer_reviews.author: DinTemecula

customer_reviews.title: My preschooler enjoys the games that accompany this toy via the app and has loved the different emotions displayed and noises Fu
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift and it was an absolute hit! My preschooler enjoys the games that accompany this toy via the app and has loved the different emotions displayed and noises Furbacca makes.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Lots of noise, but really cool
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece for Christmas. She LOVED it, her parents cursed me under their breathe because it never shuts up.
customer_reviews.author: Tom W-

customer_reviews.title: Furbacca
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves it! I would buy it for him agian. Fast delivery!!
customer_reviews.author: Morena_1

customer_reviews.title: It's Fuurbacular!
customer_reviews.text: Another friendly addition to the furry furby family, it roars the theme song and speaks like chewie! kids and adults adore it!
customer_reviews.author: Anna BanAnna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For a lover of Star Wars this is too cute.
customer_reviews.author: PEBrooks

customer_reviews.title: and we love the app
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's birthday and she loves him! He is really cute, and we love the app. I hope they plan to make other Star Wars Furbies!
customer_reviews.author: Wyndie Anglin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids love to play with it, with or without an APP. But it is still an expensive toy.
customer_reviews.author: Chun-ju Kao

customer_reviews.title: So cool
customer_reviews.text: Cute!!! My little brother will love this. Its cool how u can download a free app and play it w the furbaca
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Buy regular Furby.
customer_reviews.text: Older Furbys could repeat words, this one can not. Not much interaction. Fun toy, kids like it.
customer_reviews.author: OlyaMoscow

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Kid can't stop playing with it!! Great for star wars geeks!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think he turned evil... I don't know how... but definitely entertaining. LOL
customer_reviews.author: KittenBitten

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love furbacca, but the app is not compatible with Kindle Fire.
customer_reviews.author: primelover

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves him! Wish these things could plug in ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves him! Wish these things could plug in to recharge, instead of running through batteries.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: No box!? Misleading description
customer_reviews.text: Description is a little misleading! It says it includes a furbacca and instructions and there's a picture OF A BOX right there with it... Yet it didn't arrive in a box. It came as a furby in a plastic bag. Awesome. This is a present. That's going to look awesome getting opened up. Adding "box not included" would be helpful for those of us getting this as a present for a child.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Funny and cute
customer_reviews.text: Got this item today wife is in love lol its kind of adorable safe to say it will be loved.
customer_reviews.author: James Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Other than that my daughter had alot of fun with him
customer_reviews.text: It goes through batteries rather quickly. Other than that my daughter had alot of fun with him.
customer_reviews.author: Kk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandbabies totally love these Chewbaca Furbies. We are big Star Wars fans and these Furbacca's were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was beyond excited, wonderful christmas present, arrived on time, exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Does the chewy voice and hums the song.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla l

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome. I bought it for my daughter's birthday and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for a Christmas present. He went ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas present. He went to sleep and wont wake up. I have pushed the reset button but that doesn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Tummins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift- he is going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie T. Lipscomb

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Just won't work. Bought two different kinds of batteries, but no matter what, it doesn't stay awake for more than two seconds. It's defective, or they just are faulty in general. Sigh. I really wanted to like this, too. I could believe one set of batteries were bad, but not two sets--different kinds. Got a second for my daughter. Hers works...kind of. The 'pull tail to put it to sleep' doesn't work on hers. Really, just glitchy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Furry, talkative friend
customer_reviews.text: My grandson's favorite toy. His sounds are unusual and humorous.

customer_reviews.text: Immediately loved by my Granddaughter and Daughter who also grew up with a furbee. Order arrived a day early so was a happy surprise to all.

product_meta.title: Star Wars Furbacca
product_meta.description: Hasbro is bringing Furby to the world of Star Wars with this Furbacca figure! This fully integrated toy and app makes wookiee sounds like Chewbacca, hums Star Wars theme songs, and plays virtual activities! This Furbacca figure takes kids into a Star Wars themed digital world via their mobile device as they explore the galaxy and collect virtual Star Wars Furby Furblings. The Furbacca companion app will be available for download in the App Store and Google Play in Fall 2015. The Furbacca companion app is not required for Furbacca figure play. Includes bandolier accessory. Star Wars products are produced by Hasbro under license from Lucasfilm Ltd. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Interactive toy reacts to motion and touch
Creates an extra level of interactive play when Furbacca app is engaged
Create adventures and scenes from the Star Wars Universe
